SALCommand.Description: Rotate the dome to the specified azimuth.

item.Description: Desired azimuth; must be in the range 0 to 360. The dome will take the shortest route to the specified position.

SALCommand.Description: Close both shutter doors. This is the preferred way to close the shutter, because it automatically sequences the doors to prevent the main door from interfering with the dropout door.
Open both shutter doors. This is the preferred way to open the shutter because it automatically sequences the doors to prevent the main door from interfering with the dropout door.
Stop all motion: azimuth, dropout door and main door.

Open or close the shutter dropout door. Intended for engineering; use the openShutter and closeShutter commands for normal operation since they automatically sequence the doors to prevent the main door from interfering with the dropout door.

item.Description: Open the door if true, close it if false.

SALCommand.Description: Open or close the main shutter door. Intended for engineering; use the openShutter and closeShutter commands for normal operation since they automatically sequence the doors to prevent the main door from interfering with the dropout.

item.Description: Open the door if true, close it if false.
